channel.title: Another mix
channel.description:
so i finished this beat in like 1 hour work so dont hate i used jazz sounds and chill guitar samples, the snares & kicks are from a dj premier drumkit if i remember good
here it is http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AHs7bIAwNUo
yeah some faggot decided to dislike all my videos 1 or 2 times while i actually make my own beats lol
ill upload the mp3 if some1 wants or something or improve the beat give me some feedback noa

item.title: Another mix
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

i think you mean loop & like i said, i didnt use lots of sound (no bass, piano, etc) because i dont expect to get alot of views, money and bitches
so i only do it for fun and when im bored i just quit, most of my mixes are requested btw so most of the times i only do it for some1 else cus im cool like dat

item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

the beat needs to be synced to the acapella or it would sound like shit, and speeding up the acapella would just sound plain wrong
89.91 bpm isnt that slow either, most rap songs are around 90-95 bpm so yeah lol

wow i almost sound smart now
